text: وَمَنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَسَعَىٰ لَهَا سَعۡيَهَا وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَانَ سَعۡيُهُم مَّشۡكُورٗا
translation: But whoever desires the Hereafter and strives for it as he should, being a believer – it is those whose efforts will be appreciated[17].
footnotes: [17] Allah will accept their good deeds, multiply their reward, and overlook their sins.
